Description of incident: According to MassMutual, a "limited amount" of personal employee information maintained in a database by an outside vendor may have been subject to unauthorized access. The vendor engaged a forensics team to investigate, and at this time they believe that no misuse of the information or fraudulent activity involving the data has occurred. This database does not include client or field representative information; it also did not contain personal Social Security or bank account information, according to the company.
